name: Betterworks
slogan:
h tools that foster greater manager effectiveness and employee performance, leading to higher engagement and retention and, ultimately, better business outcomes.

The Betterworks solution combines generative AI and data analytics that enable organizations to make smart, data-informed decisions linked to performance, calibration, skill development, career development, and succession planning. 

As a comprehensive, purpose-built performance management solution, it incorporates goal-setting, manager-employee conversations, feedback, employee engagement, and recognition — all accessible in the applications employees use daily in the flow of work, like email, calendars, and messaging apps. Betterworks’ modules capture structured and unstructured data to provide HR with both comprehensive and granular views of employee performance. This enables managers to easily coach employees in both performance and career development, continuously improving performance and elevating the employee experience.

Increasing manager effectiveness
Betterworks eases the pressure managers experience by helping them more easily meet organizational and employee demands. Using conversation templates and check-in tools, managers can regularly review employee goal progress and engage in meaningful conversations around performance, recognition, and career development. This strengthens manager-employee relationships by increasing trust, transparency, and authenticity. 

Delivering a better employee experience with AI as co-pilot
Businesses achieve better outcomes when employees feel engaged, productive, accomplished, and recognized. With Betterworks AI, employees can easily develop clear goals and metrics. Employees and managers can also create personalized, comprehensive, constructive, and unbiased feedback, leading to greater trust and focused career planning. Managers can use AI to improve the quality and clarity of their communications by drawing on employee goals, feedback, recognition, and other data to confidently coach, express their expectations, and provide actionable and fair performance reviews.

name: Zensai (formerly Weekly10)

helps. You're not just tracking engagement and performance, but impacting it too.

Employees simply auto-populate their conversation agendas using reflections from their check-in and feedback they’ve received. Getting rid of 90% of meeting prep time.

Perform365 displays your interactive agenda right inside your Teams meeting, helping managers and employees focus on outcomes and action.

And when it’s time for a face-to-face conversation, Perform365 manages that too. Sending reminders and even auto scheduling your meetings for you.

name: IBM Targetprocess (formerly Apptio Targetprocess)
slogan:
at all levels to dynamically plan and manage work, resources, investments, programs, and portfolios while ensuring continuous alignment to the enterprise strategy in a single source of truth. The combination of flexible architecture and Solutions Library ensure the fastest time to value for every solution. Targetprocess is the only EAP platform that integrates directly with the industry-leading IBM Apptio financial management platform, enabling organizations to model true product TCO and more holistically manage the value of technology investments and innovation. 

Solutions:

Targetprocess brings a solutions-led strategy to the market that makes Enterprise Agile easy, allowing teams to take a building-block style approach to their agile transformation.  Strategic planning solutions allow business leaders to capture strategy and OKRs in a single source of truth, and even update priorities with confidence that portfolio, product managers, and even autonomous Agile teams will see and align their work to the new priorities. Resource Management solutions allow portfolio and product teams to plan and forecast capacity and dynamically manage resources while minimizing risks and optimizing resource utilization.  The Portfolio budgeting solutions enabled by Targetprocess partner financial teams with product and portfolio managers to enable a shift to continuous product funding, and Program Management solutions ensure the successful execution of Agile programs across hybrid and strategic portfolios. 

Strategic Planning:

Align work, labor, and investments to the strategic objectives of the business and maximize execution.

• Capture and communicate corporate objectives in a persistent tool visible by the entire organization. 

• Link specific elements of execution to strategic objectives  (i.e. initiatives, epics, features, teams, budgets, etc.).

• View the split between Run-the-Business and Change-the-Business goals and pivot investments. 

• Easily track and view progress of strategic objectives. 

Portfolio Budgeting:

Align with finance as you shift from annual funding of projects to continuous product funding.

• View portfolio totals, actuals, OpEx, and CapEx, budgeted costs, and labor and non-labor costs  in one place. 

• One source of truth to view portfolio budgets and their initiatives. 

• View the split between labor and non-labor actuals on a monthly basis. 

• Quickly change Funded costs and labor/non-labor costs in the initiative breakdown. 

Resource Management:

Optimize resources, capacity, and demand to reduce risk and maximize utilization of headcount.

• Monitor the impact of changes in real-time, with multiple views of reports to minimize inefficiency and overutilization.

• Dashboards allow optimization of incoming demand against capacity.

• Connect resource bill rates, team rates, and blended rates and utilization with automatic cost forecasting. 

Program Management:

Digitize and automate quarterly business and program increment planning. 

• Seamlessly setup PI Planning with connected backlogs for Portfolio, Product, and Teams. 

• Visualize key metrics and flow of value with Flow metrics in a customizable dashboard.

• Execute confidently by easily tracking progress in real-time, quickly identifying dependencies, and adapting to changes through the Program Board. 

 Market Differentiators:

- Flexible architecture: Targetprocess flexible architecture adapts to your organizations operating models – no matter how unique.

- Time to value: Targetprocess Solutions Library minimizes administrative overhead and delivers rapid time to value for every solution. 

- Holistic financials: Targetprocess and ApptioOne provide visibility to labor and non-labor costs for planning and managing investments.

name: Kendis: Streamlining Agile at Scale
slogan:
olution designed to support organizations in scaling their agile practices. As a versatile tool, it bridges the gap between strategic planning and tactical execution, particularly in complex, multi-team environments. Kendis excels in facilitating Program Increment (PI) Planning, a crucial component of the Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe), enabling teams to plan, commit, and execute their objectives effectively across multiple agile release trains (ARTs).

Integration is a core strength of Kendis, offering two-way, real-time syncing with popular Agile tools like Jira and Azure DevOps. This ensures that updates made in Kendis are reflected in these platforms without manual intervention, maintaining consistency and accuracy in project tracking.

Whether used for distributed teams or co-located setups, Kendis supports remote PI Planning through its online boards that simulate the physical planning experience. This feature is essential for global enterprises seeking to maintain agility and collaboration despite geographical distances.

Overall, Kendis is not just a tool but a strategic partner that enhances the agility of enterprises, allowing them to respond swiftly to market changes and innovate at scale. With its robust features for managing dependencies and identifying potential bottlenecks, it is ideal for organizations looking to implement or refine their approach to scaled agile methodologies and aligning initiatives with strategic goals. 



Key Features of Kendis:

For Business

Business Roadmap: A strategic tool designed to visually outline the key initiatives, Projects, programs that drive business objectives forward. Plan and track strategic paths, ensuring alignment between long- and short-term goals.
Strategic Themes and OKR Management: Aligns high-level strategic themes with operational goals through robust OKR (Objectives and Key Results) management capabilities.
Phases and Milestones Management: Tracks critical phases and milestones within projects, providing clear markers of progress and success criteria.
Work Breakdown Structure: 
Kanban:  An intuitive platform to visualize your workflow, streamline processes, and portfolio level work into deliverables. With customizable columns, real-time collaboration, and powerful analytics, Kendis ensures you stay on top of every task and project.
Two-Way Integration with ALM Tools: Ensures seamless data consistency and workflow continuity between Kendis and critical development tools like Jira and Azure DevOps.

FOR Program Increment 

AI-Based Analytics and Reports: Leverages artificial intelligence to provide deep insights and actionable analytics, enhancing decision-making processes.
Real-Time Boards for PI and Big Room Planning: Facilitate both onsite and remote PI Planning sessions, supporting synchronized collaboration across distributed teams.
PI Level Objectives and Risk Monitoring: Enables setting and monitoring specific objectives and risks at the PI level, ensuring alignment with strategic goals.
Dependency Management: Identifies and manages dependencies across teams and ARTs, crucial for anticipating and resolving potential bottlenecks.
Risk Management: Proactively identifies and addresses risks, implementing strategies to mitigate impact on project outcomes.
Confidence Voting: Kendis is the first online tool to offer remote confidence voting. This innovative feature enables teams to cast votes on their confidence levels regarding the PI. The feedback obtained through this voting process is crucial for adjusting plans and strategies, ensuring alignment and fostering proactive decision-making across distributed teams.
Program Increment Tracking Capabilities: Offers dynamic tracking of progress with real-time updates throughout the Program Increment lifecycle.
Scrum of Scrums: Enhances the effectiveness of Scrum of Scrums meetings by facilitating robust coordination and communication among multiple scrum teams. This feature provides insights into each team's progress, ensuring that all teams are aligned and informed.
Tools for Inspect and Adapt: Provides dedicated functionalities to support the Inspect and Adapt event, critical for continual improvement.
PI Roadmaps: Visualize and plan the future steps of project delivery with detailed PI Roadmaps that outline key deliverables and timelines.
Real-Time Flow Dashboards: Measure flow metrics in real-time, providing immediate insights into productivity and efficiency. This feature includes Cumulative Flow Diagrams (CFDs), which offer a visual representation of work items in a workflow, allowing for detailed process analysis. Additionally, it encompasses flow matrices for an in-depth examination of process efficiency, risk metrics, OKR tracking, performance charts and distribution metrics.
Real-Time Collaboration Board: Supports instant collaboration and communication, crucial for maintaining team synergy and agile responsiveness.

orming the US counter-terrorism effort from a siloed, hierarchical apparatus into a high-performing network, we developed CrossLead to scale the adaptability of small teams to the enterprise level. Our founder and CEO, David Silverman, co-authored the New York Times bestselling book Team of Teams: New Rules of Engagement for a Complex World which details the methodology that we implement with our clients. compuesta por una metodología de consultoría de negocios plasmada en diferentes módulos: estrategia, gestión, productividad, capital humano, consultoría de negocios, excelencia operacional, logística, planeación, programación de recursos, proyectos, recursos humanos, transporte y logística general, lean y consultoría operativa.

Itik está diseñada para elaborar estrategias, controlar y dar seguimiento a las iniciativas que se enfocan en cumplir todos tus objetivos empresariales. Logra controlar la operación emitiendo notificaciones a cada uno de los responsables de sus actividades, aumentando de esta manera su productividad. Puedes percibir y mejorar la satisfacción del personal por medio de evaluaciones que beneficiarán a tu clima laboral.

Itik brinda una gestión eficiente. Actualmente trabaja en nuevas y mejores soluciones pensadas especialmente para tu empresa.

name: Matilda Workspace
slogan:
globe to connect, create, coordinate, and delight their customers effortlessly. With its mission to simplify technology, Matilda empowers organisations to do more with less, making it an essential tool for startups to Fortune 500 companies alike.

Key Features:

-Powerful Apps Included: Matilda comes packed with a suite of powerful applications including Docs, Projects, Tables, Chat, Customers, and Copilot, ensuring that teams have all the tools they need to succeed.

- Create with Ease: With Docs, teams can co-edit in real time, making document creation and coordination seamless. This feature aims to replace Google Docs, Notion, and Coda, by providing a more integrated and efficient experience.

- Streamlined Project Management: Matilda's Projects feature allows for effortless management and tracking of every aspect of your projects. With capabilities like auto-scheduling, it's designed to replace tools like Jira, Trello, and Asana.

- Advanced Data Management: Although Tables are coming soon, they promise to redefine data handling by syncing data from hundreds of sources or creating new collections, aiming to replace tools like Airtable, Notion, and Segment.

- Seamless Communication: Chat brings all team communication into one place, integrated across projects, tasks, and docs, providing an alternative to Slack and MS Teams.

- Customer Relationship Management: The soon-to-be-released Customers feature will allow teams to effortlessly track leads and manage customer interactions in one streamlined interface, aiming to replace Salesforce and Hubspot.

- AI-Powered Assistance: Copilot offers custom AI assistants to help automate and streamline workflows, aiming to replace AI tools like ChatGPT and Google Bard.

Conclusion:

Matilda Workspace stands out as an all-encompassing solution that not only promises to streamline and simplify the way teams work but also embraces the future with its AI-powered capabilities and commitment to sustainability. Whether you’re managing projects, coordinating with your team, handling customer relationships, or leveraging AI for automation, Matilda Workspace provides an intuitive, powerful, and adaptable platform for every kind of team to thrive. Try Matilda today and experience the future of work, designed to help you deliver projects on time, every time.

name: NOQX
slogan: dual goals with company objectives. The platform offers intuitive features for setting company-wide goals and cascading them down to teams and individuals, ensuring alignment across the organization. Users can collaborate on projects and sprints, set lower-level goals and actions, and track progress towards overarching objectives. Leveraging artificial intelligence, NOQX streamlines goal-setting processes and provides valuable insights into progress, empowering teams to work efficiently towards shared goals. With its user-friendly interface and robust functionalities, NOQX enhances teamwork, drives organizational success, and fosters a positive work culture.
